items.sentence: I certainly had no idea Tom would be coming over tonight.
Tom found an interesting piece of driftwood on the beach.
Tom was scolded by his boss for showing up late for work.
Tom was sitting on the bench over there not too long ago.
Tom was smart enough not to do what Mary asked him to do.
I want to apologize to all of you for what just happened.
I wonder whether or not Tom will ever be able to do that.
Tom says that he hasn\'t yet had time to read the report.
Everybody was disguised, so I couldn\'t tell who was who.
Here\'s a list of people I want to invite to our wedding.
Let\'s not waste time discussing things we can\'t change.
I can\'t speak French, and I can\'t speak English either.
At sea level, water boils at one hundred degrees Celsius.
You and I have never played backgammon together, have we?
I can\'t tell you how many times I\'ve thought about you.
I don\'t think Tom knows what Mary\'s favorite flower is.
Let\'s see what else we can find out about the situation.
I\'m sure Tom would appreciate it if you didn\'t do that.
Three days before my flight, I still didn\'t have a visa.
To be honest, I have a feeling this won\'t lead anywhere.
You can probably buy one of these cheaper somewhere else.
Why didn\'t you tell me that you didn\'t know what to do?
Do you want to go out to a movie with me on Friday night?
Tom would\'ve been able to do that if he\'d tried harder.
Are you telling me Tom doesn\'t know how to speak French?
I\'m sure Tom wouldn\'t mind it if you used his umbrella.
Why don\'t you go to the park and play with your friends?
Are you sure you don\'t want to go to Australia with Tom?
Could you please tell Tom why you don\'t want to do that?
I was so busy working that I completely forgot about Tom.
Tom and Mary often go out for dinner together on Fridays.
Are you sure you don\'t want me to go to Boston with you?
Tom knew that he couldn\'t do what Mary wanted him to do.
I forgot to tell Tom to take the cookies out of the oven.
There\'s a good chance that Tom will be the next manager.
Tom told Mary not to tell anyone about what had happened.
Tom wanted a picture taken of the damage done to his car.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me I needed to do that.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me Mary had to do that.
Thanks for taking the time to answer all of my questions.
Is there any chance that Tom will be at tonight\'s party?
I don\'t think we should tell Tom we\'re going to Boston.
If you go to bed dressed like that, you\'ll catch a cold.
I would\'ve been unable to do that if you hadn\'t helped.
Tom told me that I should spend more time with my family.
Tom says that he doesn\'t want to live like that anymore.
I don\'t want Tom anywhere near his classmates right now.
I don\'t want Tom to know that Mary and I went on a date.
Tom wanted me to let you know when Mary will be arriving.
I don't think I'd be able to forgive you if you did that.
